maya/beastmayaplugin/src/rnmpass.cpp

#include "rnmpass.h"

#include "beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.h"
#include "mayautils.h"

namespace beastmaya {

RNMPass::RNMPass(const MObject& passNode, ILBIlluminationMode illuminationMode, ILBRNMBasis basis, ILBRNMAllowNegative allowNegative, bool includeNormalComponent) : 
Pass(passNode),
m_illuminationMode(illuminationMode),
m_basis(basis),
m_allowNegative(allowNegative),
m_includeNormalComponent(includeNormalComponent) {

}
        
void RNMPass::exportPass(BeastJob& job, BeastTarget& target) {

        if (!m_beastPass) {
                BeastRNMPassPtr rnmPass = job.createRNMPass(getGuid().c_str(), m_illuminationMode, m_basis);
                rnmPass->setAllowNegative(m_allowNegative);
                if (m_includeNormalComponent) {
                        rnmPass->includeNormalComponent();
                }
                if(m_basis == ILB_RB_CUSTOM) {
                        for(auto it = begin(m_customBasisVectors); it != end(m_customBasisVectors); ++it) {
                                rnmPass->addCustomBasisVector(*it);
                        }
                }
                m_beastPass = rnmPass;
        }
        target.addPass(*m_beastPass);
}

void RNMPass::addCustomBasisVector(const ILBVec3& vec) {
        m_customBasisVectors.push_back(vec);
}

}
